verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: started] [ARG1: imposing steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imports from June 1] . US allies are not happy , and officials from Britain , France , Germany , the European Union , Mexico , and Canada are hitting back .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] started [V: imposing] [ARG1: steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imports] [ARGM-TMP: from June 1] . US allies are not happy , and officials from Britain , France , Germany , the European Union , Mexico , and Canada are hitting back .

The Trump administration started imposing steep tariffs on steel and aluminum imports from June 1 . [ARG1: US allies] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: happy] , and officials from Britain , France , Germany , the European Union , Mexico , and Canada are hitting back .
